<jobs>
    <job>
        <title><![CDATA[Warehouse Manager / Delivery Driver]]></title>
        <description><![CDATA[
  

  

  
http://www.2brothersmoving.net
  

  
About Us:
  

  
Founded in February of 2007 and based in Portland, Oregon, 2 Brothers Moving & Delivery is a regionally recognized leader in residential and commercial moving services. We're moving craftsmen & women that help people transition into new and exciting parts of their life. Whether it's a small apartment move across town for a new job or a mansion across the Sierra's for retirement, 2 Brothers is here to handle the logistics of the relocation process. And as a Top 100 Fastest Growing Companies and Best Companies to Work For award winner our team provide the easiest and most hassle-free way for households to get where they're going next.
  

  
No industry revolution springs from individuals. It takes an entire team united behind something big. Together, we work hard, we laugh a lot, we brainstorm nonstop, we use hundreds of Post-Its a week, and we give the best high-fives in town.
  

  
Benefits of Career Opportunities at 2 Brothers:
  

  

  
+ A great team of hardworking dedicated co-workers who like to have fun
  

  
+ Work for a growing company with opportunities to advance
  

  
+ Tuition reimbursement for approved courses
  

  
+ Daily opportunities to solve diverse work challenges
  

  
+ Paid vacation
  

  
+ Free gym membership & health supplements
  

  
+ Regular leadership retreats, company events & gatherings
  

  

  
--------------------------------- 
  

  
2 Brothers Moving & Delivery is growing and is creating a new opportunity for a part-time Delivery Driver for our Mobile Storage product, SmartBox.
  

  
General requirements:
  

  

  
+ At least 21 years of age
  

  
+ Valid Non-CDL drivers license with up to one moving violation in the past 3 years (CDL NOT required)
  

  
+ Minimum of one-year forklift experience
  

  
+ Pass a comprehensive criminal background and reference check
  

  
+ Availability to work weekends
  

  

  
Responsibilities:
  

  

  
+ Maintain a clean, efficient and organized storage container warehouse
  

  
+ Maintain the location, inventory level and condition of the SmartBox containers, supplies and tools
  

  
+ Ensure all access appointments and SmartBox outgoing/incoming shipments are completed on time
  

  
+ Evaluate the SmartBox container delivery schedule and optimize the route based on the optimal experience for the customer
  

  
+ Deliver SmartBox containers to accounts ensuring proper placement and time restrictions
  

  
+ Be the primary point of contact on delivery day, working closely with the customer service department to ensure an excellent customer experience
  

  
+ Proactively identify and perform repairs to wood containers and vinyl covers as needed
  

  

  
Qualifications:
  

  

  
+ Proven history of working independently with little supervision required
  

  
+ Demonstrated ability to provide excellent service with frequent client contact over the phone and in person
  

  
+ Ability to manage tight timelines and an optimal delivery route using a smartphone and computer
  

  

  
Compensation:$23 - $28/hr.

    <job>
        <title><![CDATA[Mover]]></title>
        <description><![CDATA[
  

  

  
$18.75 - $22 Starting Wage! Plus an Additional $4 per hour in Cash tips!!
  

  
 Do you want an active work environment? 
  

  
 How about meeting and helping new people each day? 
  

  
 Do you like to work with supportive and friendly coworkers? 
  

  
 If you answered yes, we would love to talk to you! We are looking for enthusiastic, hardworking people who are excited about learning new skills, providing exceptional customer service, and being part of a growing company! 
  

  
 RESPONSIBILITIES 
  

  

  
+  Working with a team in the relocation of clients’ households 
  

  
+  A strong commitment in making the safety of our client’s belongings your #1 priority 
  

  
+  The ability to adapt and solve problems while balancing your safety, and the time and needs of our clients 
  

  
+  Always meeting or exceeding our client’s expectations 
  

  
+  Using creative techniques and tools to reduce physical strain 
  

  
+  Consistently providing exceptional Customer Service and ensuring communication with clients and team 
  

  

  
 REQUIREMENTS 
  

  

  
+  Exceptional Customer Service skills, including the ability to build rapport with our clients 
  

  
+  Dependable, professional and responsible with a high level of motivation 
  

  
+  Strong leadership abilities  
  

  
+  At least 18 years of age with a clean criminal background 
  

  
+  Able to safely lift 75 lbs without assistance, stand, bend, stoop and climb stairs 
  

  
+  Able to commute to NW Portland, OR 
  

  

  
 COMPENSATION 
  

  

  
+  $18/hr - $22/hr starting depending upon experience 
  

  
+  4 Dollars per hour in cash tips (average) based upon performance 
  

  
+  Professional development budget 
  

  
+  Opportunities for advancement & promotions 
  

  
+  Quarterly performance bonuses 
  

  
+  Complimentary gym on site 
  

  
+  Full time employees are eligible for medical, dental, vision, chiropractic & massage care 
  

  
+  Summer kickball team! 
  

  

  
Powered by JazzHR

    </job>
    <job>
        <title><![CDATA[Crew Supervisor]]></title>
        <description><![CDATA[
  

  

  
 Do you want an active work environment and stay in great physical shape? 
  

  
 Do you want to test your leadership skills? 
  

  
 How about meeting and helping new people each day? 
  

  
 If you answered yes, we would love to talk to you! We are looking for enthusiastic, hardworking people who are excited about learning new skills, providing exceptional customer service, and being part of a growing company! 
  

  
 RESPONSIBILITIES 
  

  
 Field Supervisor (90-95%) : 
  

  

  
+  Lead team by example in the relocation of clients’ household goods, staying active and setting the tempo of work 
  

  
+  Develop a plan with the customer, assign and communicate tasks to the crew, and lead by example 
  

  
+  Provide a commitment to making the safety of our client’s belongings your #1 priority 
  

  
+  Adapt to obstacles and solve problems while balancing your safety, and the time and needs of our clients 
  

  
+  Ensure the welfare, safety, and success of your mover crew 
  

  
+  Use creative techniques and tools to reduce physical strain 
  

  
+  Consistently providing exceptional Customer Service and ensure communication with clients and team 
  

  

  
 Operations (5-10%) : 
  

  

  
+  Supervise, train, lead, and mentor new team members through their growth and development 
  

  
+  Monitor and improve team performance, identify training and scheduling needs, and advise the operations manager on staff planning 
  

  

  
 REQUIREMENTS 
  

  

  
+  Exceptional customer service skills and communication 
  

  
+  Dependable, professional, and solution oriented 
  

  
+  Assertive and direct, with strong leadership skills 
  

  
+  Clean criminal background & driving record (3 years) 
  

  
+  Minimum age of 21 to be considered for commercial driving role 
  

  
+  No CDL Required 
  

  

  

  
+  Able to regularly lift 75 lbs without assistance, stand, bend, stoop and climb stairs 
  

  
+  Able to work overtime and evenings as necessary for larger jobs 
  

  

  
 
  

  

  
+  Supervisory experience required 
  

  
+  Commercial driving experience preferred but not required 
  

  

  
 BENEFITS 
  

  

  
+  Industry leading benefits & pay 
  

  
+  $22 - $24/hr starting pay 
  

  
+  Ability to quickly earn more (within 1-3 months) 
  

  

  

  
+  Cash tips - Avg. $4 per hour 
  

  
+  Quarterly performance bonuses 
  

  
+  Opportunities for training, growth & advancement 
  

  
+  Structured Promotion System 
  

  
+  Complimentary gym on site 
  

  
+  Medical, dental, and vision, chiropractic & massage care for full time employees 
  

  
+  Employer pays 90% of premium 
  

  

  

  
+  Summer kickball team and company events 
  

  
+  Profit Sharing on Long Distance Projects
